name: Cow Runner
description:
Lets play Cow Runner, the most popular entertaining game running game in india. This game is all about to saves animals from being served as food.
In this game cow will play lead role in saving animal and take them to home with full of stunts and fun. So help cow to escape
from farmer. You all will love this game.
In game story, One day a little cow realised that her mother and many other animals are escaping her and no one know where are they! after some
times she know the truth, that all no more because they served by farmer as food. The Cow Runner decides that she will help other animals to save their life.
Cow Runner is full of action and thriller. Cow is a Holy animal so you could use their super powers to save other animals from being served as food

To Run fast, jump cow over obstacles, slide under wooden peice and collect power ups that will much help to take freedom.

Features-

- Most entertaining game cow run game
- Amazing 2D graphics
- Smooth running on track
- Amazing and unique Power Ups
- Leaderboard
- Save other animals
- Use jump, long jump and high speed running game
- Many levels to clear
- Cow Runner is easy to understand but hard to clear
- Multi player cow runner will come soon
